name: Demo Portfolio
description: This is a demo portfolio website created using only HTML, CSS and JavaScript. This is a single page website. This website includes some animation, information about me, socail links, some projects of mine, contact me form.

name: Red Onion
description: An online restaurant website where users can buy foods. Users can add to cart and checkout. Users can not checkout until they login. Home navigator, cart implemented. This website is made using React, Tailwind, Css, Toastify and font awesome icons.

name: Dark Mode
description: This is a practice website of Starbuck created using only HTML, CSS and JavaScript. This is a single page website. This website includes dark mode and light mode.

name: Grocery Store
description: This is a practice website created using only HTML, CSS and JavaScript. This website includes products.

name: Bluewaves Hotel
description: This is a practice website created using only HTML, CSS and Bootstrap. This website is about hotel.

name: Food Restaurant
description: This is a practice website created using only HTML, CSS and Bootstrap. This website is an online reataurant website where users can see foods to order.

name: Penguin Fashion
description: This is a practice website created using only HTML, CSS and Bootstrap. This website is an online cloth store where users can see cloths to order.

name: Digital Clock
description: This is a practice clock created using only HTML, CSS and JavaScript. This digital clock will show you real time based on your location.

name: Fruits Corner
description: Warehouse management website where users can manage foods. Users can add, delete, update. This website is made using React, Tailwind, Css, Toastify, Heroku, MongoDB and font awesome icons.
tools: React, CSS, React Router, Tailwind, JWT, MongoDB
